title: Wanted - Polar Bears PSA 4-6!  Paying Premium over VCP
author: T206Cards

posts.post_title: Wanted - Polar Bears PSA 4-6!  Paying Premium over VCP
posts.post_content:
I am looking for high end Polar Bears, PSA4 up to PSA 6.  I am paying a nice premium for them right now.  I know a bunch of 4 to 6s sold on ebay over the last few weeks that I missed out on and I would pay more than the final prices on a lot of those by quite a bit.  +$100 for the 6s and +$50 for the 5s, maybe more depending on the card.  

Let me know what all you have available, paypal ready and references available if needed.  Thanks, and happy collecting!  :)
Amazing to see a PSA 6 Doc Adkins Pop 1 sell for $2,400 last night at Heritage
